title: User Story: Self-Harm

**(Option 1: Seeking Help)**

> Been feeling so overwhelmed lately. Urges are back. Reached out to a friend, but it's still tough. Anyone know good resources for coping skills? Feeling lost.

reason: Option 1 expresses active urges and feelings of being overwhelmed and lost, indicating a potential risk. While the individual reached out for help, the situation still warrants concern.
